userestrict.head: Publication Rights/ Restrictions on Use
userestrict.p: Before publishing quotations or excerpts from any materials, permission must be obtained from the Special Collections Librarian/ Associate Curator of Rare Books and Manuscripts, and the holder of the copyright, if not the Rockefeller Library at Colonial Williamsburg.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: Ebenezer Kingsley's Order to Town Treasurer to Pay Nathaniel Sears, 1738 May 8, Manuscript # MS 2000.26, John D. Rockefeller, Jr. Library, Colonial Williamsburg Foundation

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content Information
scopecontent.p: Town treasurer ordered to pay Searls N4.17.0 for keeping the minister one half of the year and two Sabbaths. Signed by Ebenezer Kingsley, John Wait, and Phineas King. Written in Kingsley's hand.
